comments: Excellent professor with real-world experience as a forensic psychologist. Class usually starts with a short video, followed by an engaging lecturediscussion. Chapter notes on Bb cover A LOT of material - downloadprint them & bring to class so you can highlightwrite in points covered in lecture. Textbook is a fun read w good reference material.

stu_tags: SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.  RESPECTED
comments: I had him every night on Monday from 5- 9:50. Every class we got out around 8:40. Wasn\'t one to drag things out but its a 4 hour class of course its going to be long. He let us take a break between psych and lab and we could eat in the classroom. We took open book quiz every class. they were easy just listen to lectures, read and participate.

tag_professor: EXTRA CREDIT (6)  Clear grading criteria (4)  Respected (4)  Gives good feedback (4)  Amazing lectures (4)  Caring (3)  Hilarious (2)  Participation matters (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Inspirational (1)
comments: Professor Forbes was an amazing teacher! I would recommend him to anyone! You don\'t need the textbook at all so don\'t bother getting it. Print off the notes and show up to class. He goes over the whole test the day before you take it. Study that and you should get an A. He is hilarious and a great class to take!

comments: Dr. Forbes made this online class very easy to manage. There were times where you have to read 2 chapters which seems like a million pages but it is an online class so you have time. He was very understanding. I very much so recommend him. Looked on this site for reviews before I took him and the good reviews about him are true! He is great!

comments: Great professor!He is very nice and makes the class fun and interesting.The class is really straight forward. It\'s an easy A as long as you pay attention to lecture and study lecture notes. The only grades are four tests which he lets you make corrections on. Definitely recommend him!

comments: Dr. Forbes is the best psychology professor ever. He is very engaged in his topic, and has a way of making the class interesting so that students do not just sit there. I feel like I learned a lot from his class, and I thoroughly enjoyed having him as a professor. An easy A as long as you pay attention and study.
